General.Name: Mission Ready Solutions Inc
General.Description: Mission Ready Solutions Inc. provides government contracting solutions to law enforcement, firefighters, first responders, military, and other governmental agencies in Canada and the United States. It offers protective services gears. The company also manufactures and distributes fire, military, emergency, and law enforcement products. The company was formerly known as Mission Ready Services Inc. and changed its name to Mission Ready Solutions Inc. in June 2018. Mission Ready Solutions Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1681 Chestnut Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 4M6

1.Name: Mr. Dong Hyun  Shim (Illinois), B.B.A., C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
